/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and pedestrians can be seen going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
